attributes.action: Show your support to our peace loving Muslim brothers and sisters
attributes.background:
Every religion has a minority of people who do bad things to advance their cause mistakenly  in the name of religion.
 Let's stand up against this minority and show our support for the majority of peace loving Muslims who want to embrace us.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
